turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So, could you hear me?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, I can hear you just fine! So no worries there. Now let’s sort out your coffee first—what type of coffee are you in the mood for, and do you have a preference on size or maybe milk? Let me know, and we’ll get it going.

turns.text: “OK, yes, I would like to taste your best coffee. Which kind of coffee do you recommend to me?”

turns.text: Sure thing! I'd say you can't go wrong with a flat white—that's a bit of a classic around here. So, how about we start with that? And do you want it with regular milk, or are you after something like oat or almond milk instead? Let me know what suits you.

turns.text: “First, I want to know if the flat coffee you say...”

turns.text: Yeah, gotcha! You're asking about the flat white. It's basically a smooth espresso with velvety steamed milk, so it's nice and creamy but not too frothy. Now, just let me know if that sounds good and what milk you’d like with it, and we’ll sort it out. How’s that sound?

turns.speaker: learner

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I would like to continue to know about the flat white. Is the cap big or is it a medium size?”

turns.text: Sure thing! So a flat white is usually in a medium-sized cup, not too big and not too tiny, just a nice balanced size. turns.text: “Avocado toast is the better option. Do you know if the bread is gluten-free?”

turns.text: Absolutely, we can do that! Yeah, we actually have a gluten-free bread option for the avo toast, so that’s no problem at all. I’ll note that down for you. turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “No, I like to be here to take the coffee and the apple toast.”

turns.text: Perfect, happy to have you stay! We’ll get you all set up to enjoy it right here. turns.speaker: learner

turns.speaker: learner

turns.speaker: learner

turns.text: That's right, exactly—"coffee" with a double F, so c-o-f-f-e-e-1-2-3. You’ve got it. Just pop that in and you should be online in no time. And with that sorted, I think we’re all set. If you need anything else, just give me a wave. Enjoy!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Could you spell the word?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: it's c-o-f-f-e-e-1-2-3. Just type that in and you’ll be good to go. And if there's anything else, feel free to ask. We’ve got you covered.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, thank you again.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, you're welcome again! Just take your time and enjoy. We’ll have everything out to you shortly. Voice chat ended 9m 35s Task 2: Booking a Restaurant Table Hey there! turns.speaker: learner

turns.speaker: learner
